title: "Robot umpires? Let’s leave baseball to real, live human beings."
excerpt: "The latest assault on our humanity came Thursday, when news broke that Major League Baseball would use an automated strike zone at Triple-A this season. It means that robot umpires will be one heartbeat from the big leagues — a “heartbeat’’ being that thing once used to deduce whether a “person” was alive."
